_README: Evidence-based activities for each wellness mode. Activities are researched and designed to be helpful, not corny.

surviving.text: 4-7-8 breathing: Inhale 4 seconds, hold 7, exhale 8
Name 5 things you see, 4 you touch, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste
Splash cold water on your face
Hold an ice cube in your hand for 30 seconds
Press your feet firmly into the ground
Box breathing: Inhale 4, hold 4, exhale 4, hold 4
Say out loud where you are and that you're safe
Quick body scan: Notice tension in each body part
Touch 3 different textures around you
Run cold water over your wrists
Tense and release: Shoulders, fists, jaw
Count all the blue (or any color) objects you can see
Smell something strong like peppermint or citrus
Hold something heavy and focus on its weight
Push against a wall with both hands for 10 seconds
Triangle breathing: Inhale 3, hold 3, exhale 3
Say the full date, time, and day of week out loud
Drink ice-cold water slowly
Cross arms and tap alternating shoulders gently
Visualize your safest place in vivid detail

drifting.text: Take a quick shower or change clothes
Send a simple text to a friend
Drink a full glass of water
Watch birds or nature for 5 minutes
Watch 10 minutes of a comfort show
Play with a pet for 5 minutes
Watch one funny video that makes you laugh
Use a pleasant scent or essential oil
Record a voice memo about how you're feeling

grounded.text: 5 minutes of focused breathing meditation
Write down 3 things you're grateful for
Complete body scan from head to toe
Drink tea or coffee mindfully, savoring each sip
10 minutes of seated meditation
Mindful walk focusing on nature sounds
Practice loving-kindness meditation for self
Check in with your emotions without judgment
10 minutes of gentle yoga or stretching
Stream-of-consciousness journal for 10 minutes
Eat a meal mindfully without distractions
Notice 5 things in the present moment
Reflect on what matters most to you
Count 50 breaths without distraction
Thank your body for what it does for you
Listen to calming music for 10 minutes
Complete your evening wind-down routine
30 minutes completely phone-free
Set one healthy boundary for yourself
Speak to yourself like you would a good friend

growing.text: Set one SMART goal for today
Learn something new for 15 minutes
Practice a skill you're developing
Visualize your ideal future self
Do something slightly outside your comfort zone
Read one chapter of a growth-focused book
Reach out to a mentor or role model
List 5 recent wins or accomplishments
Try a new positive habit today
Work on a creative project for 20 minutes
Ask for constructive feedback on something
Connect with someone in your field
Use one of your strengths intentionally today
Complete one lesson of an online course
Optimize your morning routine
Reflect on growth from this past week
Take one small step toward a goal you've been avoiding
Write a thank you note to someone
Identify what drains and energizes you
Celebrate a recent achievement, big or small

quickWins.text: Take 3 deep breaths
Reach your arms up high
Drink a glass of water
Stand up and sit down 5 times
Shake your whole body for 10 seconds
Roll your neck gently in circles
Shrug shoulders to ears 10 times
Circle your wrists 10 times each direction
Flex and point your feet
Massage your temples and jaw
Splash cold water on your face
Smile at yourself in a mirror
Look out a window for 20 seconds
Tidy one small area near you
Delete 5 old emails or messages
Add a song to a playlist
Think of one thing you're grateful for
Say one positive thing about yourself
Notice your feet on the ground
Massage your hands for 30 seconds
Do 10 jumping jacks
Push against a wall for 10 seconds
Balance on one leg for 10 seconds
Do 5 cat-cow stretches
Stretch side to side
Forward fold and hang for 10 seconds
Clasp hands behind back and open chest
Make big circles with your hips
March in place for 30 seconds
Do 10 high knees
Do 10 butt kicks
Make big arm circles forward and back
Twist your torso left and right 10 times
Close eyes and rest for 20 seconds
Yawn and stretch big
Force yourself to laugh or smile for 10 seconds
Hum your favorite tune
Put your phone in another room for 10 minutes
Set a 5-minute break timer
Recall one recent win
